chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait d t <-> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states d) t

Premises:
DTA_kill_empty_states = fun d : DTA => DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d : DTA -> DTA
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
dt_kill_empty_semantics : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t < -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
dt_kill_empty_r : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t -> reconnaissance d a t
dt_kill_empty_d : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
dt_non_empty_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> forall n : nat, term_high t <= n -> MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
dt_kill_empty_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), term_high t <= n -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dt_kill_empty_def_1 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), term_high t <= n -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t -> reconnaissance d a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dt_non_empty_d : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
dt_non_empty_def_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
dt_non_empty_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
dt_non_empty_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
dt_non_empty_lazy_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
dt_non_empty_r : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
dt_non_empty_r_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
dt_non_empty_def_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop
pre_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
